```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(tibble)

cities <- tibble(
  name = c("San Francisco", "Paris", "Montreal", "Madrid", "Hanoi", "Tahiti", "Cape Town"),
  lat = c(37.7602523640256, 48.86198773083308, 45.50566793423559, 40.415765578600706, 21.034791719384796, -17.543761791615648, -33.9255539018927),
  lng = c(-122.42681736086065, 2.294159806953058, -73.5819271670175, -3.7063982175738746, 105.8347141261459, -149.83170940623626, 18.43387871377049)
)

leaflet(data = cities) %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addAwesomeMarkers(~lng, ~lat, popup = ~name,
                    icon = awesomeIcons(
                      icon = "globe", iconColor = "black", markerColor = "blue", library = "fa"
                    ))
```
